thread.section_title: Hotel de France Invalides - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Our city break to paris
thread.title_full: Our city break to paris - Review of Hotel de France Invalides, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Huggy-from-Scotland
title: Our city break to paris
text:
Great hotel, Great central location five minute walk from the Eiffel Tower, Two to three minute walk from the metro and taxi rank is literally one minute walk. Surrounded buy nice bistros. Lovely friendly staff. I would recommend this hotel 100%.
I will book it next trip to Paris.
